email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 75,000 MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Our initial quote is $28 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, which has a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 300m. The laycan is set for 2023-10-01 to 2023-10-10.

Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements.

Best regards,
Laura Miller
Ocean Cargo Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the quote. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. We are looking for a rate closer to $25 per metric ton.

Could you review and adjust the rate accordingly? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Peter Wilson
Maritime Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering the current market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of $26 per metric ton. The demurrage rate will be $15,000 per day.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements and if you need any further details on the laycan or stem.

Best regards,
Laura Miller
Ocean Cargo Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of $26 per metric ton is more in line with our expectations. However, we need to ensure that the demurrage rate is reasonable. Could you confirm the laytime start and end dates?

Best regards,
Peter Wilson
Maritime Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

The laytime will start on 2023-10-01 and end on 2023-10-10. We can offer a laytime of 7 days with the demurrage rate of $15,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Miller
Ocean Cargo Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Peter Wilson
Maritime Transport

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Miller
Ocean Cargo Brokers
